CustomField.description: Reference to Equipment Flag for verizon.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( NokiaCPQ_Item_Type__c, 'Service'), '', IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( NokiaCPQ_Item_Type__c, ''), ISPICKVAL( CPQ_Secondary_Category__c , '')) , 'N', 'Y') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reference to Equipment Flag for verizon.
CustomField.label: Equipment Flag
